main event: Two witnesses observed a highly unusual light in the night sky from Russell Park, Ilion, New York, on July 8, 1966.
interesting points: The light was first seen as a single entity before splitting into a double light that turned sharply in different directions., Binoculars revealed the light to be a fairly large luminescent object., The light came into view at an approximate 45-degree elevation and was observed for about 15 minutes., Witnesses noted that the object made abrupt speed changes and brightened significantly after turns., The object was lost from sight after becoming obscured by clouds.
sighted object: unusual light in the night sky
witness description: two friends observing from Russell Park
